headline: Amphenol Corporation Announces Pricing of USD-Denominated Senior Notes Offering
summary: WALLINGFORD, Conn., June 09, 2025--Amphenol Corporation (NYSE: APH) (the "Company") announced today the pricing of its offering of $750 million aggregate principal amount of senior notes due 2028 (the "USD Notes"). The USD Notes will have an interest rate of 4.375% per annum. The closing of the offering of USD Notes (the "USD Notes Offering") is expected to occur on June 12, 2025, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.
